title: Trucks
subtle: Informational (nonfiction), 33 words, Level B (Grade K), Lexile BR60L
description: In Trucks students will learn about the variety of objects that trucks carry. The detailed photographs allow children to see that trucks come in many shapes and sizes depending on what they are hauling. This nonfiction book provides a wonderful opportunity to practice classifying information. The repetitive phrases and high-frequency words support early emergent readers.
meta: carry, cement, garbage, logs, mail, trucks
Use the reading strategy of connecting to prior knowledge to understand text
Initial Consonants : Discriminate initial consonant /s/ sound
Complete Sentences : Recognize and use complete sentences
High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency word some

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
